pageContext.description: Decoration consisting of three vertical ribs on each side of blade and connected by raised band at neck. Rough cast from mould. Loop broken off recently.
pageContext.patina: Oxidization almost black, metal where broken, grey colour.
pageContext.associations: Hoard: 1 Winged Celt; 1 Looped Palstave; 7 Socketed Celts.
pageContext.collection: Museum Leeds Phil. + Lit. Society,Presented by W. H. Bartholomew, Esq.,L.V. (War Loss)
pageContext.site: England,Yorkshire,Stanley,Stanley Ferry,near Wakefield,Dredged from the River Calder at Smalley Bight.
